title: ONE OPS
description: A comprehensive platform for managing projects, tasks, inventory, and CRM functionalities. Built with the MERN stack, it offers a seamless user experience with real-time updates and responsive design for both web and mobile (React Native). Deployed on an Ubuntu VPS for production.

title: Silicon Leaf Todo
description: A modern todo application with features like task prioritization, due dates, and user authentication. Designed with a clean UI and optimized for performance, it supports cross-device synchronization using a RESTful API.

title: Easy Bill
description: A billing management system for small businesses, featuring invoice creation, payment tracking, and reporting. Built with a focus on simplicity and efficiency, it integrates with third-party payment gateways.
